page.title: 15BARCLAY SCHOOL STEVENAGE
page.content: The school was designed by the team of {Yorke, Rosenberg and Mardell.}The founder of the firm{Francis Yorke,}was one of the pioneers in England of the international modern style of architecture.{The Barclay School}has many features such as a swimming pool, beautiful buildings used for Sience, Chemistry, Gym, Maths and English. There are lots of visual arts such as a{Mural}by Kenneth Rowntree in the foyer; the{William Morris} wallpaper and the large bronze{'Family {group'}sculpture by{Henry Moore.} Wide corridors and ample circulation areas mean that movement around the building is easy, and no one has to go outside to get from one place to the other. The age of the children is from 12_18 and there are{910}pupils in school. {_____________________________}
